Summary: Object caught on tape while observing aircraft formation *smaller sized file*
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Columbia
There was one other sighting in Columbia on or around November 15th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was called by my boyfriend to step outside to witness several aircraft flying in formation and emitting unusual contrails. I had my camcorder nearby and decided to film them. After reviewing the footage I noticed a small object briefly move through the left side of the screen. My camcorder was at maximum zoom at the time, so this object was at the same altitude or higher than the aircraft formation. The attached video shows the aircraft contrails and the small flying object. I have reviewed this footage several times and you can see that the object clearly makes a turn to the left. It also appears to pulsate.
